page.title: 16Elderly People in Tavistock
page.content: A lot of old people live in Tavistock.Some have lived in Tavistock all their lives and some come here when they retire because it is peaceful and near the Moors.Most old people live in their own homes or with their families, but some live in { residential homes}or old people's { flats}so that they can be looked after. There are 8 private residential homes in Tavistock looking after about 100 old people.There is one large council-owned home called{Harewood} {House,}accommodating 57 people. There is also a{Day Centre}where old people go for a cup of tea and to meet their friends. The old people we talked with in Tavistock were happy; the residential homes are warm and cosy, and have a good atmosphere.
